dmca.title: ATTN: George Doletes: ABUSE of my written work
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Crystal [mailto:quiverfull@gorge.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 5:03 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: ATTN: George Doletes: ABUSE of my written work 
Subject: ATTN: George Doletes: ABUSE of my written work 


To: George Doletes (the Designated Agent)
 
I have a good faith belief that there is copyright violation of my
written work on the website www.qwhip.com, which you host.
 
I certify under penalty of perjury that these works are mine and I have
not given the person posting them permission to publish my works.
 
Below is the URL form the website and below that is the URL of my
website with my works on the site.
 
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9249  
Link to my site with my article:
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/timewithjesus.html
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9188
Link to my site with my article: http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9187
Link to my site with my article:
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/homemanagement.htm
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9191
Link to my site with my article:
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/trainkeepersathome.html
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9209
Link to my site with my article:
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/badattitudes.html  (the person doing
this took the part I had written near the bottom of the page)
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9190
Link to my site with my article:
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/meantohomestead.htm  (the person doing
this took part of this article, starting about 1/3 the way down the
page).
 
http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9410
Link to my site with my article:
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/homebirth.html 
 
 
If I have failed to give  you all the proper information you need,
please let me know what you need and I will get this to you.
 
You may reach me by email at: quiverfull@gorge.net  
Or by phone at 1-509-427-5504
 
Crystal Miller
http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com <http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com>  
<http://lilypie.com/>
